  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project​(int number, String name, String buildingType, String address, int erfNumber, double totalFee, double totalPaid, LocalDate deadline, Person architect, Person contractor, Person customer)
      The project constructor that instantiates project objetcs
      Parameters:
      number - A unique int per project object
      name - What the project object is called
      buildingType - Classification of the object
      address - Location of the object
      erfNumber - Number relative to map
      totalFee - Amount due by customer
      totalPaid - Amount paid by customer
      deadline - Date project should be completed by
      architect - Person object
      contractor - Person object
      customer - Person object

      public void setContractor​(int id, String newName, String newTelephone, String newEmail, String newAddress)

      newName - updated name of contractor object

      newAddress - updated address
